addOnDescription.message: PassSec+ alerts the user to enter passwords on websites where they could be compromised.
addOnDescription.description: Short description of the add-on's functionality

urlInfoText.message: You are visiting the following website:

formURLInfoTextData.message: The data entered would be sent to the following website:

formURLInfoTextPassword.message: The password would be sent to the following website:

verifyDomain.message: Verify this information before you enter data here.

verbleibendeZeit.description: Remaining time until field is activated.

appearanceSecure.message: Appearance, if the input is secure:

appearanceNotSecure.message: Appearance, if the input is NOT secure:
appearanceNotSecure.description: Title for appearance if not secure

changeIconText.message: You can change the icon for secure input here:

iconHint.message: Note: If there were only one icon, fraudulent websites could fool you into thinking that it is safe to enter a password or other sensitive data, because the website itself would display the field with a green border and add the appropriate icon.

addRedirectionList.message: It is possible to add some redirects recommended by SECUSO. More information and a list of redirects can be found on https://www.secuso.org/passsec.

httpsRedirects.message: List of domains that are automatically redirected from http to https (secure mode)

deleteEntryWarning.message: Are you sure you want to delete the list entry  '$ENTRY$' ?
deleteEntryWarning.description: Warn user before deleting a list entry

deleteAllEntriesWarning.message: Are you sure you want to delete all entries in the list?
deleteAllEntriesWarning.description: Warn user before deleting all list entries

userTrustedList.message: List of domains you classify as 'low risk'.

userExceptionList.message: List of domains you classify as 'low risk'.

lowRiskDomains.message: List of domains considered 'low risk' by developers (green frame).
lowRiskDomains.description: Activate timer on list of trusted domains.

activateLowRiskList.message: Activate list of domains the developers consider as 'low-risk'

userTrustedDomains.message: List of domains that you have classified as 'low risk' (blue frame).
userTrustedDomains.description: List of user risk domains (websites with https).

userExceptions.message: List of special cases where PassSec+ has detected an anomaly but you have decided that there is a low risk (red background)
userExceptions.description: List of user risk domains (websites with http).

userList.message: List of domains you classify as 'low risk'.

editUserList.description: Show and edit list of user risk domains.

checkExceptions20Starts.message: Check exceptions automatically after 20 browser starts.

checkExceptions20StartsTooltip.message: This check is used to keep the list of exceptions up to date.
checkExceptions20StartsTooltip.description: Tooltip for Check website exceptions after 20 starts

fieldTypes.message: Types of fields, which are taken into consideration

paymentFieldDescription.message: Fields with payment information (E.g. credit card numbers)

personalFieldDescription.message: Fields with further personal data (E.g. e-mail addresses)

notesOnFields.message: Note: PassSec+ makes every effort to identify and then mark the appropriate fields. Unfortunately, this is not always possible. If you notice on a web page that a field was not recognized, you are welcome to send us this web page and we will try to further develop PassSec+ accordingly.
notesOnFields.description: Text for notes on the fields

brokenHTTPS.message: Classify BROKEN HTTPS connection as safe

brokenHTTPSDescription.message: BROKEN-HTTPS means that the website is encrypted with HTTPS, but also contains elements that are not encrypted and are therefore blocked by default by the browser.

defaultSettingsWarning.message: Do you really want to restore the default settings? All stored redirects and exceptions are going to be deleted!
defaultSettingsWarning.description: Warn user before restoring default settings

savedChanges.message: Changes saved! Please reload the page on which you are using PassSec+.

defaultSettingsRestored.message: Default settings restored! Please reload the page on which you are using PassSec+.

confirmAddingHttpExceptionTitle.message: Do you really want to add an exception?
confirmAddingHttpExceptionTitle.description: Title for adding exception on http site

confirmAddingHttpException.message:
If you add this exception, then you will no longer be warned when you visit websites from
$SITEDOMAIN$
with
$SITEPROTOCOL$
and if the website is configured so that data you enter is sent with
$FORMPROTOCOL$
to a website from
$FORMDOMAIN$
confirmAddingHttpException.description: Warn user before adding exception on http site

confirmAddingHttpsException.message:
Do you want to add an exception for the website
$URL$
?
confirmAddingHttpsException.description: Warn user before adding exception on https site

confirmExceptionButton.message: Yes, I know what I am doing!

buttonDeactivationAddingHttpException.message: The left button has been disabled so you can consider if you want to add the exception.
buttonDeactivationAddingHttpException.description: Disabling the button for adding the exception.

riskText4111Data.message:
Unknown risk:
The risk for entering sensitive data in this field cannot be determined. You have to classify the risk yourself.

riskRecommendation4111Data.message: Check the domain (bold area of the URL).

moreRecommendation4111Data.message: Check the domain (bold area of the URL).

moreInfo4111Data.message: This means that the domain (bold highlighted area) of the URL and thus its trustworthiness is not known to PassSec. It is not among the most frequently visited domains in Germany. URLs with this domain have also not been identified as trustable by you in the past. [less]
moreInfo4111Data.description: Info text if the domain is unknown but the website uses https.

inputDelayText4111.message: The input has been disabled to give you time to check the domain.
inputDelayText4111.description: Text for Deactivation of the link

riskText4111Password.message:
Unknown risk:
The risk for entering your password in this field cannot be determined. You have to classify the risk yourself.

riskRecommendation4111Password.message: Check the domain (bold area of the URL).

moreRecommendation4111Password.message: Check the domain (bold area of the URL).

moreInfo4111Password.message: This means that the domain (bold highlighted area) of the URL and thus its trustworthiness is not known to PassSec. It is not among the most frequently visited domains in Germany. URLs with this domain have also not been identified as trustable by you in the past. [less]
moreInfo4111Password.description: Info text if the domain is unknown but the website uses https.

riskTooltipSummaryHttpOnlyData.message: There is no secure connection to the website.

riskTextHttpOnlyData.message:
High risk:
The risk for entering sensitive data is considered high because the website was accessed with 'http'. Accessing with 'http' does not establish a secure connection to the website.

riskRecommendationHttpOnlyData.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. [more]

moreRecommendationHttpOnlyData.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. If necessary, contact the website operator and ask to enable https. [less]
moreRecommendationHttpOnlyData.description: More recommendations info to use https

moreInfoHttpOnlyData.message: It is not possible to access this website with 'https'. This website therefore offers no possibility to protect your data entered here from being intercepted by unauthorized persons.
moreInfoHttpOnlyData.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummaryHttpOnlyPassword.message: There is no secure connection to the website.

riskTextHttpOnlyPassWord.message:
High risk:
The risk for entering your password is considered high because the website was accessed with 'http'. Accessing with 'http' does not establish a secure connection to the website.

riskRecommendationHttpOnlyPassword.message: Do not enter a password here. [more]

moreRecommendationHttpOnlyPassword.message: Do not enter a password here. If necessary, contact the website operator and ask to enable https. [less]
moreRecommendationHttpOnlyPassword.description: More recommendations info to use https

moreInfoHttpOnlyPassword.message: It is not possible to access this website with 'https'. This website therefore offers no possibility to protect your password entered here from being intercepted by unauthorized persons. If you decide to enter a password here after all, make sure that this is not a password that you also use for other websites. Otherwise, unauthorized persons who eavesdrop on this password will be able to log in to other user accounts of yours as well.
moreInfoHttpOnlyPassword.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummaryHttpsAvailableData.message: There is no secure connection to the website.

riskTextHttpsAvailableData.message:
High risk:
The risk for entering sensitive data is considered high because the website was accessed with 'http'. Accessing with 'http' does not establish a secure connection to the website.

riskRecommendationHttpsAvailableData.message: Switch to the 'https' version, of this website. [more]

moreRecommendationHttpsAvailableData.message: Switch to the 'https' version, of this website. To always access this website automatically via 'https', click on 'Switch to https'. [less]
moreRecommendationHttpsAvailableData.description: More recommendations info to use https

moreInfoHttpsAvailableData.message: If you access the website with 'https', there is a secure connection to the server. This is one of three conditions that should be fulfilled before you enter sensitive data on a website. It is also important that you are connected to the correct server and that the sensitive data you enter is also sent to that same server over a secure connection. The input field is red if any of these conditions are not fulfilled. [less]
moreInfoHttpsAvailableData.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummaryHttpsAvailablePassword.message: There is no secure connection to the website.

riskTextHttpsAvailablePassword.message:
High risk:
The risk for entering your password is considered high because the website was accessed with 'http'. Accessing with 'http' does not establish a secure connection to the website.

riskRecommendationHttpsAvailablePassword.message: Switch to the 'https' version, of this website. [more]

moreRecommendationHttpsAvailablePassword.message: Switch to the 'https' version, of this website. To always access this website automatically via 'https', click on 'Switch to https'. [less]
moreRecommendationHttpsAvailablePassword.description: More recommendations info to use https

moreInfoHttpsAvailablePassword.message: If you access the website with 'https', there is a secure connection to the server. This is one of three conditions that should be fulfilled before you enter your password on a website. It is also important that you are connected to the correct server and that the password you enter is also sent to that same server over a secure connection. The password field is red if any of these conditions are not fulfilled. [less]
moreInfoHttpsAvailablePassword.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummary4110Data.message: Your entered data would be sent to another server.

riskText4110Data.message:
High risk:
The risk for entering sensitive data is considered high because the website will send the entered data to another server.

riskRecommendation4110Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. [more]

moreRecommendation4110Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. If necessary, contact the website operator and ask to check the configuration of this website. [less]

moreInfo4110Data.message: The website will send the sensitive data to another server.

riskTooltipSummary4110Password.message: The password would be sent to another server.

riskText4110Password.message:
High risk:
The risk for entering your password is considered high because the website will send the entered password to another server.

riskRecommendation4110Password.message: Do not enter a password here. [more]

moreRecommendation4110Password.message: Do not enter a password here. If necessary, contact the website operator and ask to check the configuration of this website. [less]

moreInfo4110Password.message: The website will send the password to another server. If you do decide to enter a password here, make sure it is not one you use for other websites. [less]
moreInfo4110Password.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummary4101Data.message: Your entered data would be sent over an insecure connection.

riskText4101Data.message:
High risk:
The risk for entering sensitive data is considered high because the website does not send the entered data to the server over a secure connection.

riskRecommendation4101Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. [more]

moreRecommendation4101Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. If necessary, contact the website operator and ask to use https. [less]

moreInfo4101Data.message: The website sends your data via 'http' instead of 'https'. So this website does not provide any way to protect your data entered here from being intercepted by unauthorized persons. [less]
moreInfo4101Data.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummary4101Password.message: The password would be sent over an insecure connection.

riskText4101Password.message:
High risk:
The risk for entering your password is considered high because the website does not send the entered password to the server through a secure connection.

riskRecommendation4101Password.message: Do not enter a password here. [more]

moreRecommendation4101Password.message: Do not enter a password here. If necessary, contact the website operator and ask to use https. [less]

moreInfo4101Password.message: The website sends the password via 'http' instead of 'https'. This website does not offer any way to protect your password from being intercepted by unauthorized persons. If you decide to enter a password here, make sure that it is not a password that you use for other websites. Otherwise, unauthorized people who eavesdrop on this password will be able to log in to other user accounts of yours as well. [less]
moreInfo4101Password.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummary4100Data.message: Your entered data would be sent to another server via an insecure connection.

riskText4100Data.message:
High risk:
The risk for entering sensitive data is considered high, as the website, does not send the entered data over a secure connection and additionally to another server.

riskRecommendation4100Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. [more]

moreRecommendation4100Data.message: Do not enter sensitive data here. If necessary, contact the website operator and ask to check the configuration of this website. [less]

moreInfo4100Data.message: The website sends your data via 'http' instead of 'https'. So this website does not provide any way to protect your data entered here from being intercepted by unauthorized persons. Moreover, the sensitive data is sent to another server.  [less]
moreInfo4100Data.description: Info https: user enters login data.

riskTooltipSummary4100Password.message: The password would be sent to another server over an insecure connection.

riskText4100Password.message:
High risk:
The risk for entering your password is considered high, because the website, does not send the entered password over a secure connection and additionally to another server.

riskRecommendation4100Password.message: Do not enter a password here. [more]

moreRecommendation4100Password.message: Do not enter a password here. If necessary, contact the website operator and ask to check the configuration of this website. [less]

moreInfo4100Password.message: The website sends the password via 'http' instead of 'https'. So, this website does not provide any way to protect your password from being intercepted by unauthorized people. Moreover, the password is sent to another server. If you decide to enter a password here after all, make sure that this is not a password you use for other websites as well. Otherwise, unauthorized people who eavesdrop on this password can log in to other user accounts of yours as well. [less]
moreInfo4100Password.description: Info https: user enters login data.

inputDelayText.message: The input has been disabled so that you can consider how to continue.
